title: About VOOM
subtitle: An innovative platform for convenient, safe and cost-efficient intercity travel.
text1: VOOM is a modern carpooling platform that connects passengers and drivers, making intercity trips more affordable, safe and comfortable.
text2: Our service helps reduce transportation costs, decrease road congestion, and improve mobility opportunities across Uzbekistan.
text3: VOOM is an innovative project developed by FAYKHANUR Enterprises Group LLC â€” a group focused on next-generation digital products and smart services.
